hero.title: Your Health Shouldn't Wait
hero.subtitle: We're building the healthcare platform you've been waiting for. Skip the phone tag, waiting rooms, and appointment hassles. Book visits, message your doctor, get prescriptions, and access your records - all from your phone.

features.title: Healthcare That Works Around You
features.subtitle: Everything you need to take control of your health - no medical degree required. Join us as we transform patient care.

scheduling.title: Book Appointments Instantly
scheduling.description: See your doctor's real-time availability and book appointments in seconds - no phone calls, no waiting on hold. Get reminders so you never miss a visit.

security.title: Your Health Data, Protected
security.description: Your medical information is encrypted and secure. Only you and your authorized doctors can access your records - guaranteed.

multiPlatform.title: Access Anywhere, Anytime
multiPlatform.description: Whether you're on your phone, tablet, or computer, your health information syncs automatically. Check results on your couch or book appointments on the go.

telemedicine.title: Doctor Visits from Your Couch
telemedicine.description: Skip the waiting room. Get face-to-face care through secure video calls - perfect for follow-ups, prescriptions, or when you just don't feel like leaving home.

solutions.title: Take Control of Your Healthcare Journey
solutions.intro: We're building a platform that puts everything you need in one place - so you can spend less time managing healthcare and more time living your life. Be among the first to experience the future of patient care.
features: Book appointments in 60 seconds - see real-time availability and secure your slot instantly, no phone tag required
Your entire health history, organized - medical records, test results, and visit notes all in one secure place you can access anytime
Message your doctor like texting a friend - ask questions, request refills, or get advice through secure chat, no waiting for callbacks
Prescriptions sent straight to your pharmacy - get refills approved and sent to your preferred pharmacy with one tap
Video visits when you need them - see your doctor face-to-face from home for routine care, follow-ups, or urgent concerns

compliance.title: We Guard Your Health Data Like It's Our Own
compliance.description: Your health information is personal, and we treat it that way. MediCare meets the strictest global standards for healthcare data protection - so whether you're in New York or Berlin, your data stays private, secure, and always under your control.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Healthcare Differently?
cta.subtitle: Join the waitlist and be among the first to access MediCare when we launch
cta.note: Early access available soon · No credit card required · Get launch notifications

hero.title: Your Patients Need You,
hero.subtitle: We're building the practice management platform that lets you focus on patients, not paperwork. Streamline scheduling, automate billing, and give yourself the tools you need - so you can run a thriving practice without the administrative headaches.

features.title: Practice Management That Actually Works
features.subtitle: Everything you need to run a successful practice—no complexity, no compromise. Built by physicians, for physicians.

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling That Actually Works
scheduling.description: Real-time calendar syncing across all providers. No more double-bookings, no more phone tag, no more scheduling chaos. Book appointments in seconds and get automatic reminders.

security.title: Security You Can Sleep Easy About
security.description: HIPAA-certified, GDPR-ready encryption protecting every piece of patient data. Role-based access controls mean only authorized personnel see sensitive information - guaranteed.

multiPlatform.title: Run Your Practice From Anywhere
multiPlatform.description: Whether you're on your phone, tablet, or computer, everything syncs automatically. Check schedules from home, approve prescriptions on the go, or review performance from your office.

telemedicine.title: Built-In Telemedicine, Zero Setup
telemedicine.description: Secure video consultations built right in. See more patients, offer flexible hours, and reduce no-shows - all without extra software or complicated setup.

solutions.title: Focus on What Matters: Patient Care
solutions.intro: We're building a platform that handles the administrative burden so you can focus on what you do best: caring for patients. Join forward-thinking physicians transforming their practice operations.
features: Streamlined SOAP notes with voice dictation - document visits in half the time while maintaining thorough records
AI-assisted diagnosis suggestions and drug interactions - get real-time alerts for potential interactions and treatment alternatives
Digital prescriptions sent directly to pharmacies - no more phone calls, faxes, or patient trips to pick up paper scripts
Comprehensive patient timeline with all interactions - see every visit, message, and prescription in one chronological view
Performance analytics and patient satisfaction metrics - track your practice's health with actionable insights and trend analysis

compliance.title: We Guard Patient Data Like You Do
compliance.description: Your patients trust you with their health information, and we take that responsibility seriously. MediCare meets the strictest global standards for healthcare data protection - so whether you're treating patients in your community or across state lines, their data stays private, secure, and always compliant.

cta.title: Ready to Reclaim Your Time and Focus on Patients?
cta.subtitle: Join leading practices transforming how they deliver care. Get early access to the platform designed with physicians in mind.
cta.note: Early access for practice partners · Free onboarding support · Launch Q3 2026

hero.title: Healthcare Delivery at Scale
hero.subtitle: We're building the enterprise healthcare platform that lets your clinical teams focus on patient outcomes, not administrative overhead. Eliminate operational complexity across all locations, streamline multi-site workflows, and give your organization the tools needed to deliver exceptional care at scale.

features.title: Enterprise Platform Built for Healthcare at Scale
features.subtitle: Everything your organization needs to deliver exceptional care across all locations—unified operations, measurable outcomes, superior patient experience.

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling That Actually Works
scheduling.description: Real-time calendar syncing across all providers and locations. No more double-bookings, no more phone tag, no more scheduling chaos. Book appointments in seconds and get automatic reminders.

security.title: Security You Can Sleep Easy About
security.description: HIPAA-certified, GDPR-ready encryption protecting every piece of patient data. Role-based access controls mean only authorized personnel see sensitive information - guaranteed.

multiPlatform.title: Enterprise Command Center, Anywhere
multiPlatform.description: Unified dashboard for executives and department heads across all devices. Monitor multi-location performance, track organizational KPIs, and make data-driven decisions from anywhere with real-time insights.

telemedicine.title: Built-In Telemedicine, Zero Setup
telemedicine.description: Secure video consultations built right in. See more patients, offer flexible hours, and reduce no-shows - all without extra software or complicated setup.

solutions.title: Transform Operations, Elevate Patient Care
solutions.intro: We're building an enterprise platform that eliminates administrative complexity so your clinical teams can focus on what matters most: delivering superior patient outcomes. Be among the first health systems to experience the future of healthcare operations at scale.
features: Manage every location from one dashboard - see real-time performance across all your sites, monitor staff utilization, and spot bottlenecks before they become problems
Your entire organization at a glance - patient volume, revenue trends, staff schedules, and inventory levels all in one secure place you can access from anywhere

Automate the billing headaches - claims submission, payment tracking, and revenue cycle management handled automatically, so your admin team stops chasing paperwork and starts focusing on patient experience
Never run out of critical supplies - smart inventory alerts notify you before you're out of stock, with automatic reordering for essential medications and supplies
Custom workflows that fit how you work - configure approval processes, automate compliance reporting, and set up role-based permissions exactly how your organization needs them

compliance.title: We Guard Patient Data Like You Do
compliance.description: Your patients trust you with their health information, and we take that responsibility seriously. MediCare meets the strictest global standards for healthcare data protection - so whether you're treating patients in Boston or running multiple locations across Europe, their data stays private, secure, and always compliant.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Healthcare Delivery at Scale?
cta.subtitle: Join leading health systems transforming how they operate and deliver care. Get early access to the enterprise platform built for your organization.
cta.note: Early access for clinic partners · Implementation support included · Launch Q3 2026

footer.tagline: Healthcare that puts you in control. Access your doctors, manage appointments, and take charge of your health - anytime, anywhere.
